critical_gaps.message: Parametric tests used without documented normality checks.
critical_gaps.evidence: ...xon rank sum test, ‡dependent t-test. CAPTION: Change in outcomes...

critical_gaps.message: Sample size justification lacks explicit power calculation details.
Reporting of blinding or masking procedure is missing.

actionable_recommendations.recommendation: Report Shapiro-Wilk/KS test or use non-parametric tests.
Provide alpha, power, and effect size parameters.
actionable_recommendations.source_text: No matches for 'power' or 'sample size calculation'
